text: @AJEnglish Headline says, German dogs detect COVID-19 in people, but the video grab shows a dog sniffing a box! And the sub-headline then modifies their certainty of ‘can 94% of the time’ to ‘shows promise’!!  And the mainstream media can’t understand why many people don’t trust them!?
